name: THE YACARE
description:
-Argentine Animals Collection-

Introduction:

I present this collection of autochthonous animals from Argentina so that you can discover the incredible fauna that inhabits the South American soil. I illustrate these bastions of our cultural heritage with a stylistic key that represents me. These first 3 designs are the beginning of a collection that over time I intend to extend paying tribute to the most acclaimed animals.

THE YACARÉ
(uncommon 48 editions)

Its name means crocodile in the Guaraní language. It is a magnificent prehistoric creature that reaches reckless sizes and whose bite is one of the most lethal. Its indiscriminate hunting is dangerous for its conservation so in recent years measures are already being taken to help the species. I leave this illustration to you to remember the wonders that exist in Argentina.
